MICRO
	c BOOTSTRAP
m00 0000000000011100100000001000001111010111 //Sw+0->PC,MAR
m01 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c LOAD R,$K
m02 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m03 0000000000011100001100001010001110011101 //MDR+0->X
m04 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m05 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m06 0000000000010000000110100000001110011111 //X+0->NOP,FEEDBACK
m07 0000000000011100001100000000001010011101 //MDR+0->SELB=0
m08 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m09 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c STORE R,$K
m0a 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0b 0000000000011100001100001010001110011101 //MDR+0->X
m0c 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0d 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m0e 0000000000010000000110100000001110011111 //X+0->NOP,FEEDBACK
m0f 0000000000001100000100000000001000011111 //B+0->NOP,MWE,SELB=0
m10 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m11 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c ADD R,$K
m12 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m13 0000000000011100001100001010001110011101 //MDR+0->X
m14 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m15 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m16 0000000000011100001100000000001110011101 //MDR+0->Y
m17 0000000000010000000110100000001110011111 //X+0->NOP,FEEDBACK
m18 0000000000000100001100000000001010011111 //R+Y->R,SELB=0
m19 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m1a 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c SUB R,$K
m1b 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m1c 0000000000011100001100001010001110011101 //MDR+0->X
m1d 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m1e 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m1f 0000000000011100001100000000001110011101 //MDR+0->Y
m20 0000000000010000000110100000001110011111 //X+0->NOP,FEEDBACK
m21 0000000000000100101100000000001010011111 //R-Y->R,SELB=0
m22 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m23 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c SHL R
m24 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m25 0000000000011100000100000000001010011101 //MDR+0->NOP,FEEDBACK
m26 0000000000001100011100000000000010011111 //B+0->B,SELB=0,SHIFT
m27 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m28 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c DEC R
m29 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m2a 0000000000011100001100000100011110011110//0+1->ACC
m2b 0000000000011100000100000000001010011101 //MDR+0->NOP,FEEDBACK
m2c 0000000000000100101101000000001010011111//B-ACC->B,SELB=0
m2d 0000000000011100001100000100001110011110//0+0->ACC
m2e 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m2f 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c HALT
m30 0000000000010000001101000000001111011111 //PC+0->PC,MAR
m31 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c ADD R1,R2
m32 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m33 0000000000011100001100001010001110011101 //MDR+0->X
m34 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m35 0000000000011100001100000000001110011101 //MDR+0->Y
m36 0000000000010000000100000000001110011111 //Y+0->NOP,FEEDBACK
m37 0000000000001100000100000000001000011111 //B+0->NOP,MWE
m38 0000000000011100001100000000001110011101 //MDR+0->Y
m39 0000000000010000000110100000001110011111 //X+0->NOP,FEEDBACK
m3a 0000000000000100001100000000001010011111 //B+Y->B,SELB=0
m3b 0000000000010100001110001000011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m3c 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
MAPPER
m00 02 LOAD R,$K
m01 0a STORE R,$K
m02 12 ADD R,$K
m03 1b SUB R,$K
m04 24 SHL R
m05 29 DEC R
m06 30 HALT
m07 32 ADD R1,R2
MAIN
m00 00
m01 01
m02 20
m03 02
m04 01
m05 21
m06 03
m07 01
m08 22
m09 05
m0a 01
m0b 04
m0c 01
m0d 04
m0e 01
m0f 00

m12 02
m13 02
m14 21
m15 05
m16 02
m17 04
m18 02
m19 07
m1a 01
m1b 02
m1c 01
m1d 01
m1e 22
m1f 06
